title: Software Engineer
bullets: Converted monolithic programs to a web services-oriented architecture.
Developed 3 Restful APIs and maintained about 8 Restful APIs using Spring Boot and deploying them with Jenkins and Docker. Scalability and reliability always are top priority.

I had the chance to use Playwright to build a web crawler. The web crawler was part of a Kafka Event Driven Architecture. I discovered various flaws in the website that allowed the crawling to operate much faster.
Used Thread pools to make a time consuming Kafka Consumer 50% faster, thus increasing the overall throughput.
Used ABBY OCR and Apache Tika to apply regex and extract data from documents.
My main programming language is Java, especially version 11 but I worked with 8 and 17.
